content.html:
Welcome to the 22 new users to this instance TONIGHT, and & for many of you, welcome to the #Mastodon & the #Fediverse.

Promise this will be different than Twitter for those of you migrating on the Elon news. We're working to make it BETTER than what all the closed, centralized ad driven, spaces.

Welcome to this ride, glad you are here.

The rough edges are there, but so is the promise of building something that will grow to outlive all the closed silos...

#Welcome #Admin #indiwebsocial
